data.title: Chat Rooms App
data.description: Built a chat room web app that allows users to create their own chat rooms and join other rooms with the custom room ID. It was developed using the NextJS framework, using Firebase for user authentication, Firestore for the real-time database, and styled with Tailwind CSS.

data.title: Portfolio Website
data.description: Created a personal website to showcase my skills, projects, and achievements. The website was developed using the Astro framework and styled with Tailwind CSS. Microsoft Azure has also been used to deploy and host the website.

data.title: Airline Optimization
data.description: Worked on a team of six to create a class project that utilizes Dijkstra's shortest path algorithm. Through a CLI, the user can load a graph of cities and carry out various functions related to airplane travel between them.

data.title: Employee Database
data.description: Worked on a team of six to create a class project that utilizes a Red-Black tree. Through a CLI, the user can load a CSV file of employees and carry out various functions related to analyzing the companyâ€™s employees.

data.title: Minesweeper Game
data.description: Clone of the popular Minesweeper game. Created as an introductory project to the Python language.

data.title: Snake Game
data.description: Clone of the popular Snake game. Created as an introductory project to the Python language.
